entry.title: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH IN EFFECT, Toronto
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 29.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 29.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 59 %
Humidex: 37
Dewpoint: 20.4°C
Wind: SW 36 km/h gust 57 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers or thunderstorms. Low 16.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Showers with a few thunderstorms beginning early this evening and ending near midnight. Clearing after midnight. Risk of severe thunderstorms this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 this evening. Low 16. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High 23. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016
